name: Bowling Blitz: Unleash Your Power!
summary: Experience the ultimate VR bowling party with Bowling Blitz: Surprise Power! Unleash thrilling power-ups like Multiball and Time Reversal, bowl through vibrant alleys like underwater restaurants and icy castles, and master Individual Challenges or AI tournaments. Customize your style, unlock rewards, and enjoy immersive gameplay with dynamic visuals and a party vibe. Get ready to roll and dominate the lanes in this exciting VR adventure! 🎳✨
